alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 12:47PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, 1 to 4 inches Virgin and Rockville. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on SR-9 from Rockville to the east entrance.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
